ygData.subject: Re: Underwater areas
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe now I heard hate was through Oasis?  And Air is reached in Rathe, seems like it as it s high, high up on a pedestal and guarded by Aviaks.  All I hear is
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe now I heard hate was through Oasis? And Air is reached in Rathe, seems
like it as it's high, high up on a pedestal and guarded by Aviaks. All I
hear is talk about adding zones to Odus, nothing of the planes. I suppose
we'll just have to wait. All I know, there's some kind of portal down there
(I just assumed water because of all the ice everywhere and the fact one
must swim to get to the caverns).

Roop


>From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
>I have heard the portal in the Everfrost caves is to the plain of Hate.
The
>Water Plain entrance I have heard is in Lake Rathe, I think.
>
>
